channel.description: Latest Financial News for Groupon, Inc.

item.title: 4 Internet Stocks Crushing Netflix So Far in 2016
OrderUp from Groupon Launches in Pittsburgh, Offering On-demand Delivery from Top Local Restaurants
item.description: [Business Wire] - OrderUp from Groupon announced that its on-demand food delivery app has expanded its service to Pittsburgh. Starting today, residents and businesses downtown and in Oakland, Shadyside and Squirrel Hill can use the OrderUp app to have food delivered directly to their doorstep from some of the area’s best local restaurants.

item.title: 3 Stocks That Would Benefit From a Recession
Silicon Valley nightmare: SEC wants to crack down on screwball accounting gimmicks
4 beaten-down Internet companies that are takeover targets
item.description: [at MarketWatch] - Owning these stocks is risky, but could be rewarding, writes Michael Brush.

item.title: Groupon Unveils New Platform for Merchants, Shares Fall
Groupon Buyout At $7.35?
Groupon Could Get More Users From Facebook In New Social Media Push
item.description: [at Investor's Business Daily] - Groupon's (GRPN) pledge to trim down and over-deliver as it transforms its operations drew praise Tuesday from investment bank William Blair. Groupon interim CFO Brian Kayman and investor relations chief ...

item.title: Groupon Expands Merchant Platform, Providing Local Businesses Everything They Need to Create and Manage a Successful Promotion
item.description: [Business Wire] - Today, Groupon announced a series of website, mobile and tablet enhancements that make it easier for merchants to create and manage the perfect Groupon marketing campaign for their business across any of their devices, wherever they’re located.

item.title: Groupon Celebrates Beauty Week by Announcing the Most Pampered City in America
item.description: [Business Wire] - In honor of Spring Beauty Week, Groupon announced today that Salt Lake City was the most pampered city in America over the past year. Groupon customers in Utah’s capital and most populous city bought more massages, haircuts, manicures, pedicures, facials, teeth whitening and tanning sessions, and other indulgent deals on a per user basis than any other place in the country.

item.description: [at Forbes] - Bottom line: Alibaba will come close to meeting the top end of its target of raising $3-$4 billion with a new bank loan, and chances are as much as 50-50 that it will use the funds to make bids for Groupon or the stake of itself held by Yahoo. After first

item.title: How Groupon Could Help Alibaba Penetrate the US Market

Facebook Buys Popular Face Filter Startup, Groupon Plunges After Lower Rating
item.description: [at TheStreet] - Facebook snapped up a popular app startup that allows users to alter their face with funny filters. Groupon tanks after an analyst report.

item.title: [$$] Chipotle shares slide after restaurant closure
item.description: [at Financial Times] - Chipotle shares suffered a blow on Wednesday after the Mexican fast-food restaurant said a Massachusetts restaurant was temporarily closed after it learnt that four of its employees had fallen sick. News ...

item.title: Groupon’s stock tumbles after UBS turns bearish
item.description: [at MarketWatch] - Groupon stock tumbles after UBS downgrades the daily deals company to sell from neutral.
